title: Differentiator: True Cost and Mulltiple Consumption Options
content: The COA Product is not a cost accounting system.  While costing is a key part of the product definition, it is not “the product definition” but rather something that is embedded in more overarching goals such as the analytics that measure patient value, initiatives that improve efficiencies, and reports that gauge patient satisfaction, outcomes, and the quality of care.  The COA Architecture will allow for the best representation and presentation of cost through the application according to the data available and a clients willingness to undertake initiatives to evolve their environments into more meaningful costing.
